thread.title_full: Very comfortable stay at this EVEN Hotel - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: katmo8
title: Very comfortable stay at this EVEN Hotel -
text: I love staying at this hotel! I travel to NYC for work, and this hotel is very convenient for me. Every visit the staff is incredibly helpful and pleasant. I love the ability to have workout equipment in my room, and the infused water in the lobby is so refreshing. Even when I'm traveling by myself, I always feel comfortable staying at this EVEN Hotel.
